item.description:
Where Your Sweet Pea isn’t the Only One Having Fun!!

The Sweet Pea Yoga Weekend Meetup features Itsy Bitsy Yoga classes for Babies, Toddlers and Tykes to enjoy with their parent—on a Saturday!

Each Meetup will feature a simplified and fun-to-learn Itsy Bitsy Yoga class where new, occasional, and ongoing students can enjoy the developmentally sound yoga postures, sweet rhymes and songs that we have all come to love. We invite you to dance the Yogi Yogi, explore your Baby Planet and practice your Tree Pose in a safe, clean and welcoming environment.

Please, just 1 adult from each family may attend class at a time. Thank you for understanding.

TYKE / LITTLE FAMILY (Sibling) Class Description:
Tykes Itsy Bitsy Yoga combines unique toddler-friendly yoga poses with songs, stories, and games to create an enriching parent/child activity. Tyke will learn yoga through social interaction, repetition, and play. Tykes also learn how to relieve frustration, improve motor skills, and increase attention span by actively following directions. Help your tyke build the foundation for a healthy and fit lifestyle while having fun! No yoga experience is required.

Younger Siblings are welcome to join. Sibs over 12 months are $8 extra, under 12 months and they can come for FREE!
item.name: Weekend Tykes/Little Family (sibling) Meetup (March)
